sen.j: 十条通（じゅうじょうどおり）は京都市の主要な東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: The Jujo-dori Street is one of the major east-west running street in Kyoto City.
Jujo-dori Street is one of the major east-west streets in Kyoto City.
Jujo-dori Street is one of the major east-west streets in Kyoto City.

sen.j: 東端の本町通 (京都)との交差点（本町通十条）から西端の西大路通との交差点（西大路十条）に至る。
sen.e: It runs from the eastern end -the intersection with the Honmachi-dori Street (Kyoto) (Honmachi-dori Jujo) - to the the western end -the intersection with the Nishioji-dori Street (Nishioji-Jujo).
It runs from the eastern end--the intersection with Honmachi-dori Street (Kyoto) (Honmachi-dori Jujo) --to the western end (the intersection with Nishioji-dori Street (Nishioji-Jujo)).
It runs from the eastern end--the intersection with Honmachi-dori Street (Kyoto) (Honmachi-dori Jujo) --to the western end (the intersection with Nishioji-dori Street (Nishioji-Jujo)).

sen.j: 平安京の大路小路とは関係のない、近代になってから九条通の南に作られた通りである。
sen.e: The street has no relation with the Oji-koji (alleys and main streets) of Heiankyo; its was developed later in the modern era to the south of the Kujo-dori Street.
The street has no relationship to the oji-koji (alleys and main streets) of Heiankyo; it was developed later in the modern era to the south of Kujo-dori Street.
The street has no relationship to the oji-koji (alleys and main streets) of Heian-kyo; it was developed later in the modern era to the south of Kujo-dori Street.

sen.j: 歴史が浅い通りのため、鳥羽通とも呼ばれる。
sen.e: It may be rather called Toba-dori Street, because of its short history.
It could also be called Toba-dori Street because of its short history.
It could also be called Toba-dori Street because of its short history.

sen.j: また、京都市中心部と山科区を結ぶ新たな道路として、十条通を東方に延長する形で阪神高速道路8号京都線（阪神高速道路8号京都線便宜上の路線区間の名称）が完成した。
sen.e: In addition, the Hanshin Expressway 8 Go Kyoto-sen (tentative name) was completed in such a manner that the Jujo-dori Street is extended as a road connecting central Kyoto and Yamashina Ward.
sen.cmt: カッコ内は「阪神高速道路8号京都線」を「仮名」として訳しました。
sen.e: Additionally, the Hanshin Expressway 8 Go Kyoto-sen (tentative name) was completed in such a manner that Jujo-dori Street has been extended as a road connecting central Kyoto and Yamashina ward.

Additionally, the Hanshin Expressway Route 8 Kyoto Line (tentative name) was completed in such a manner that Jujo-dori Street has been extended to the east as a new road connecting central Kyoto and Yamashina Ward.
sen.cmt: 阪神高速道路8号京都線→the Hanshin Expressway Route 8 Kyoto Line 東方へ、 を追加

sen.j: 交差する道路などの特記がないものは市町村道。
sen.e: Roads unless specified are operated by local municipalities.
Roads are operated by local municipalities unless otherwise specified.
Roads are operated by local municipalities unless otherwise specified.
